divs: Sighting DetailsIt was around 11pm we were driving down Verona Rd between Battle Creek And Marshall and as we approached the intersection of Verona Rd and 13 Mile Rd I saw on the left side of the road a object with a very bright spot light type light hovering just over the trees the object was shining this spot light on the ground and the trees and ground were lit up as if it was daytime and as we got closer to this thing it instantly went from just above the trees to being way up in the sky so I told my mom to stop the car and she did we all got out of the car and watched the object it then started to move towards us and it flew right over us it did not make any noise and it looked triangle shape with 3 white lights one in the front and two in the back with a red light in the center and none of the lights were blinking it slowly drifted to east northeast. It was the strangest thing i have ever scene. I have included a quick sketch
Summary: ufo hovering over trees shining very bright spot light on ground
